GeolocationCoordinatesAltitude.summary:
The GeolocationCoordinates.altitude read-only property is
a double representing the altitude of the position in meters above the WGS84
ellipsoid (which defines the nominal sea level surface). This value is null
if the implementation cannot provide this data.

remarks.para:
-Using the Geolocation API
-The interface it belongs to.
-National Imagery and Mapping Agency Technical Report 8350.2, Third Edition (WGS84)

GeolocationCoordinatesAltitude.value:
A double representing the altitude of the position in meters above the WGS84
ellipsoid.
